mapper.select: select t.id,t.name,t.post,t.update_date from t_teacher t where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_teacher(id, name, post, update_date) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{post}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update: update t_teacher set name = #{name}, post = #{post}, update_date = #{updateDate} where id = #{id}
